name: Poultry-Price-Optimization Business  App
description: End User Enablement :: Find Optimum Price which maximizes Revenue for a SKU based on the final model/solution.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

PRICE OPTIMIZATION APP

PO

Optimum Pricing Analytical App:

Empowering businesses to determine optimal pricing strategies, maximizing revenue potential effortlessly.

Key Features

  • + Browse for File: Click on the "Browse" link located under the "Load File" section.
  • + Select Product Size: Choose the size of the product, for which you want to find the maximum pricing, from the dropdown menu.
  • + Model Prediction: Click on the "Get Prediction" button to get the Revenue versus Price visualization graph and the Maximum price, revenue and RPI's against the product.
  • + Business Validation: Finally the "Run Laddering" button will use the model prediction data to optimize the revenue based on the laddering method.

Feature Columns & Their Description

FIELD NAME DESCRIPTION METHOD USED
Year_WeekYear and week number in the format YYYY-WW52 Weeks Year Starting From Monday, Grouped at SKU
SALES_VOLUMEVolume of salesMEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_PRDPrice of a pack of ProductMEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR1Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 1MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR2Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 2MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR3Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 3MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR4Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 4MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR5Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 5MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
ADV_SPENDAmount spent on search advertisingSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
BAUBusiness as UsualSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
EVENTEventSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
FLEETINGFleeting SalesSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
SVDSales Value DaySUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
LOG_SALES_VOLUMENatural logarithm of sales volumeNatural logarithm
LOG_PRD_PRICENatural logarithmic value of Product pack priceNatural logarithm
LOG_WEEK_MIN_PACK_PRICE_PRDNatural logarithmic value of Weekly Minimum Product pack priceNatural logarithm
PRD_CDCode assigned SKU valueSKU
SIZESize of the productDefault size value of the SKU
